UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Salusin-beta, an antimicrobially active peptide against Gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Kimura M, Shindo M, Moriizumi T, Tagawa N, Fujinami A, Kato I, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=8µM),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis NBRC 3989(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella typhimurium NBRC 12529(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NBRC 3317(MIC=>128µM),Serratia marcescens NBRC 3046(MIC=>128µM)
